a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Time women and men spent on leisure
The average time women and men aged 15-65 spent on leisure activities. Surveys for most countries were
conducted between 2009 and 2016, but some countries have older surveys.
Note: Leisure activities include sports, attending events, visiting friends, watching TV, among others.
